did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence leaflet which explains the group's purpose and functions, and undated letter to Jack from Fabian (no last names) which describes the group's inner politics and activities.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: An order of gay male nuns which promotes gay liberation, freedom from guilt over the gay lifestyle, and safe sex. The members hold a variety of religious faiths and ideological positions.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence leaflet which explains the group's purpose and functions, and undated letter to Jack from Fabian (no last names) which describes the group's inner politics and activities.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence ephemera, #7664. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
